main.name: Edwin Torres
main.description: Specializing in building exceptional websites, applications, and everything in between
main.bio: Recently I earned my Front-End Web Development certificate from Kenzie Academy in Indianapolis IN, and I would love to apply the skills I refined at Kenzie and my passion for technology to your Software Engineering role. In addition to my studies, I have spent the better part of my life being fascinated with and staying informed with the latest advancements in tech. Whether it be in hardware or software. Seeing the great advancements year-over-year in all aspects of tech excites me. And motivates me to not just be a part of that advancement, but be a spearhead of it.
main.contactmessage: I am currently looking for new opportunities. If you are interested in what I have to offer, please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have.

education.description: An intense and comprehensive 52-week Software Engineering course that prepares students to enter the workforce with the knowledge and skills sought after by employers throughout the industry for Front and Back-End Development.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
